${ModID}:BrineBolt.NAME: Brine Bolt
${ModID}:BrineBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target loses HP equal to its starlight:Wet.

${ModID}:Hydration.NAME: Hydration
${ModID}:Hydration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! starlight:Wet to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BubbleShield.NAME: Bubble Shield
${ModID}:BubbleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! starlight:Wet back.

${ModID}:Deluge.NAME: Deluge
${ModID}:Deluge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Deals additional damage equal to the target's starlight:Wet. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Deluge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Deals additional damage equal to the target's starlight:Wet.

${ModID}:Maelstrom.NAME: Maelstrom
${ModID}:Maelstrom.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! starlight:Wet to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply starlight:Burn equal to the target's starlight:Wet.

${ModID}:Flood.NAME: Flood
${ModID}:Flood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! starlight:Wet, Weak, and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Whirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
${ModID}:Whirlpool.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies take !M! damage for each starlight:Wet they have.
